page.title: 02COUNTRY BLISS
page.content: Although this area itself offers no tourist accommodation other than two or three holiday cottages, it borders to the North West on a popular centre for both caravanners and campers. These visitors find much to enjoy in our area. Picnic sites and nature walks of varying lengths have been designated by the Forestry Commission, but people are free to wander at will - a compass and or a knowledge of the area is advisable when doing the latter. For the bird watcher, the botanist, or people who simply enjoy quiet country walking this area is ideal.
